description: Section 73 application to extend the time period stated in condition 1 of planning ref: P02/2457 to enable the continuation of the recycling operation until 31 December, 2004.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  The limited period for the use hereby permitted shall be until 31 December 2004 on or before which date the use shall be discontinued or determined.

REASON:  The applicant has sought temporary permission and the type of use is not such as the Local Planning Authority is prepared to approve, other than for a limited period, having regard to the medium to long term development plans that have been approved for this site and the surrounding area, which are for mixed commercial and residential uses, and which the proposed scheme would be incompatible with.
